definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing mountain/☶/ancient Chinese compass point: 45° (northeast)
expression or emotion showing in one's eyes/meaningful glance/wink/eyesight (dialect)
to have one's eyes on (a goal)/having sth in mind/to concentrate
soon/in a moment/to look on as sth happens
